com.monochromeroad.grails.plugins.xwiki.macro
[Java] Class DefaultXWikiMacro

java.lang.Object
  org.xwiki.rendering.macro.AbstractMacro
      com.monochromeroad.grails.plugins.xwiki.macro.DefaultXWikiMacro

public abstract class DefaultXWikiMacro
extends org.xwiki.rendering.macro.AbstractMacro

XWiki macro takes some parameters (e.g. {{code for="java" /}}) to use in Grails.

You need to create a constructor that takes no arguments.

Parameters:

- Macro Parameters Class

Authors:
Masatoshi Hayashi
